name: Tiny Funky Timmy
description:
- RULES -

Find the four discs and bring it back to the JUKEBOX before the timer runs out TO SAVE THE PARTY!

Collect the MUSIC NOTES ON YOUR WAY TO BUY UPGRADES for the DJ’s turntable... make the timer go slower and gain music notes passively!

- CONTROLS -

Move - WASD
Jump - SPACEBAR
Interact - F
Crouch - CTRL
Run - SHIFT
Shoot - MOUSE LEFT CLICK
